name: show
content: Sometimes seeing the turtle icon is helpful when it is drawing something, other times you might want to hide the turtle so it does not obscure the picture.

examples.name: Basic Example
Example: Peek-a-Boo
examples.description: Use buttons to hide and show the turtle.

return_value: No return value. Alters the display only.
short_description: Makes the turtle visible at its current location.
tips:
- [hide()](/docs/applab/hide) is often used with show().
- The turtle's ability to draw is not effected by the show() or hide() commands, which only control if the turtle icon is displayed or not.
